positive.review: The survival mechanics in this game are top-notch. Whether you're scavenging for resources or teaming up with friends, every session feels fresh and exciting. A must-play for survival game fans

its a really challanging game.. i struggled in the first but got the hang of it and it becmae really easy to do everything.. sometimes it gets boring to do the same thing everyday but its all worth it in the long run.. would recommend
i really appreciate that progress feels organic. you don‚Äôt get showered with rewards, but when you achieve something, it feels earned. that kind of satisfaction is rare in modern games

Honestly, I joined expecting just another survival shooter, but I was surprised. The world feels alive ‚Äî you hear distant shots, dogs barking, people trading by the fire. The combat is tense but fair, and looting is rewarding without being overpowered. For anyone into atmospheric survival, this is worth your time

i really like how immersive the atmosphere is, especially during night missions, the lighting, sounds and little details make you feel like you are really there, plus the player community is welcoming and fun to interact with
The atmosphere, plot, style and vibe are all present. The optimisation could be better, but otherwise it's great, i recommend it
I'm not a big fan of MMOs, but I like the post-apocalyptic style of the game
very good atmosphere and most big maps, I liked it, recommend
It's a great game, it does look a bit old, but still
One person helped me, and I remember it. It was nice. Respect to the community
Compared to other games, the atmosphere here is very powerful, which is worth a lot
The atmosphere and gameplay make everything work; it's a very interesting game

Initially, it was my friends who recommended it to me, and that's the only reason I decided to play. Actually, it's not bad at all. They didn't deceive me, but of course it's not perfect. Nevertheless, I can recommend it.
An atmospheric game in a post-apocalyptic style; I think it's a successful combination
Shooting rats and dogs by the campfire is just the thing
It's actually not bad, very atmospheric and realistic, I recommend it
This game is perfect for streaming; it's fairly measured and quite long
I've played many games, but this one stands out, maybe because of its atmosphere, but I like it
There are lots of quests, each with its own storyline. I like that. The post-apocalyptic atmosphere works well with the storyline

While the game is interesting, there is still a lot of work to be done
Even in its current state, however, it plays quite well

It's interesting, challenging, and very atmospheric at the same time
I don't know what else to add, it's just a great game
I liked the community. Even though I was new, they immediately helped me, telling me what to do and how to do it. It's rare to find that in games like this
the very interesting and atmospheric game, I recommend it
The game is definitely not a masterpiece, but it's not crap either. There are clearly more positive emotions than negative ones, which is why I recommend it.
I can't quite put my finger on it, but I really liked this game. It has a great atmosphere. I recommend it.
Good game, very interesting atmosphere, I think I'll recommend it

A good game similar to dayz, but it misses half of the gameplay and its difficult to understand unless u really want to play it. Fix that with more markers, a lineal story, or a server based mode. And u have the next goty battling with dayz and project zomboid
As far as I understand, the game takes place in post-apocalyptic Russia, which gives it a slightly scary and frightening vibe for me. The atmosphere really does its job.
After work, it's the perfect time to sit back and relax

I think the game is not bad overall, and for free, it definitely has a place to be
It's interesting

Nice and smooth graphics plus the ambience makes you feel like you are really inside The Zone. Survival mechanics are not over detailed and not over simplified either. You wont get lost in the mechanics while trying to survive in the zone. You have to watch over your steps, think about every action before you give a decision. I like it so far. Lets see whats going to happen next.

What I enjoy most is the sense of progression. It‚Äôs not about grinding levels ‚Äî it‚Äôs about becoming more skilled at surviving. Learning when to move, when to hide, when to engage. Every mistake teaches you something valuable.
I like how the environment tells a story. You can guess what happened in a place just by looking at it.
Ai needs a little more work id say, at least for the bandits.
It's very atmospheric, that's true, but there are also problems
I like it, it is not perfect by any means but you can quest and roam the Zone with friends, find artifacts, vodka...

The game has exceeded my expectations. The survival mechanics feel well-balanced, and the day-night cycle adds a layer of immersion that keeps me hooked. I appreciate how the loot feels rewarding without being too easy ‚Äî every find feels earned. PvE encounters are tense, and PvP keeps me on my toes. Definitely worth my time
As a newcomer, they even helped me, for which I have sincere respect for the community
I like how unpredictable encounters are. One moment you‚Äôre looting, next moment you‚Äôre in a firefight
To be honest, the game is actually quite good; there are many things to do
thats wery good mmorog vith cool community and design
atmospheric and realistic
I want to say that I recommend this game and agree with most of the reviews
perfect for relaxing and unwinding
very good game no hands down one of the best games i a have played
its one of the best stalker like online games but i still perfer stalkcraft
It may not be a masterpiece, but it was made with love
It's a good game, I think it would be perfect for playing with friends
well, I played it and can honestly say that it's a good game
There are many things to do, and there is something of interest for everyone
A good game for free, I don't see any downsides
this is good game, very atmospheric
it's just a normal game, but nothing more
The game has a very strong atmosphere
games are not for everyone, but that's the point
Not a big fan of this kind of thing, but I was impressed
There are many interesting things to do in this game
I've tried similar games, but this one stands out somehow. I liked it
We played with friends, and we all seemed to enjoy it
cool, cool, no questions asked
I recommend this for patient players
I'm not a big fan of games like this, but this game doesn't disgust me; it's somehow different
I think she is underrated.
It's too cool for a free game
normal game, online bigüëç
I would even say that I enjoyed playing it; it's a good game
you can't believe this game is free to play
very atmospheric
thats okay
great game
I give this game seven out of ten
I recommend the game
I enjoyed playing
the balance is good
I enjoyed playing

nothing seemed to be lagging

It's really not a bad game; it's interesting, very atmospheric, and realistic
I personally like that
If only the optimization could be improved a little, it would be perfect, but for now it's not bad
very good game that people can enjoy but would be nice to have south african servers
Game is nice, have been playing for a few K hours and i must say its goo. Beginning is hard, but as soon as u get the start its awesome.
Top design, top atmosphere, top realism, optimization is present, it's not a masterpiece, but everything else is done well
To be honest, the game is very interesting and atmospheric

negative.review: Got game liked it at first bought a bunch of stuff from market. Was hacked and my things stolen from me and admins of game refuse to do anything so i got an account that is useless. Cant play game anymore. Spent hundreds of dollars on game as well...... russian scam all the way. This game is how my account got hacked 100 percent.
It‚Äôs nothing special or unique. With poor optimization and really clunky controls, it‚Äôs worth it to skip the game and do almost anything else.
really not much to say the game is boring played an hour and nothing really happened.
Way too much useless dialogue, boring lore, and the game bugged and deleted my Pistol when I tried Equipping/Switching from my knife.  Terribly done and it's been years lol.  Much better games exist.

good concept, horrendous execution.
if early access goes on for 5 years, it's time to toss the towel lil bro 0/10

i cannot play on this with someone whom is five feet away in my home yet i saw one random dude do  not recomend playing tried to find out how to fix and cannt i dont think its vary co-op if u cant esily join ur own friends with out hours of resherch
The game feels so bare at times and the PVP just sucks
not that fun. slow and not engaging
Not sure why I have this or why it's installed.
No women characters.

this is the worst survival game ever , no teleports no vehicles nothing but walking you should just rename is to walking simulator , you need to walk like 15 min from a place to another just to take a pakage to delever it to the same place you have been before and if somone or something kills you between these points you gonna have to start from the same place with less loot , and everything is high priced in the game even the most little thing and you need to do like 3 missions of just walking and delever things to get just little money in the game , what a bad shitty game it is , and its pay to win BTW

Kinda terrible for a free game, played it for an hour and feels very out of place for what it is. I get the game came out nearly 10 years ago but getting out of the first area took way to long and it should just be a breeze in and out situation.
No matter which graphical settings I pick I  will have between 24-30 FPS on a solid machine. CPU and GPU utilization is barely 50%.

I want to like it I really did but it's just not great at all, the connection issues are bad, character customising is just white man 1 and white man 2, you cant change your gender, there are no options for colored people or women. The game also crashed 20 min into it. I love the concept, the gameplay is really good for the small amount of time I played it, but other than that it is really hard to enjoy it.

Ping/ ms is so high, up to 300ms. ASA server not exist. model are so old, just one model exist in this game, they are changing only here colour and style.
* I saw one more important thing, they are not hearing their audience, this game really need more big map and more character and cars.
